'''"They Know Not Life, Who Dwelt in the Netherworld Not!"''' is [[Furina]]'s Level 4 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When using the Singer of Many Waters, the Energy restoration effect will still trigger even if all nearby active characters are at full HP and no HP is restored.

==Trivia==
* The French name of this constellation, "{{Fr|Si l'on comprend la vie, amis, c'est en enfer !}}", is a line taken directly from the libretto of ''{{w|Orpheus in the_Underworld|Orphée aux Enfers}}'' by {{w|Jacques Offenbach}}.
